name: LifeLink (Gavinbot)
description:
Lifelink is a wave-based game where you spend health to upgrade your player

Spend health to increase your Rate-of-Fire, LifeSteal and more

By round 5 you'll be sweating

It fits the theme because you must sacrifice your own health to upgrade yourself.

________________________________

Currently only supported window size is 1920x1080, Will work on it.
